ComicInfo.Summary:
Virgil lectures Mercy on why ignoring orders can lead to big problems. Meanwhile things escalate after Mercy finds herself a potential victim of a very dangerous killer... And this enemy is nothing like what she has ever faced before.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Edgar Salazar & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Gregbo Watson & Thiago Dal Bello | 2 | C | Cover C | Deacon Black | 3 | D | Cover D | Roberta Ingranata & Ylenia Di Napoli | 4 | Note: The digital edition (5/4/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
